summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Help Center feature. All 11 backend tests passed (100%) and all 15 frontend UI tests passed (100%). The feature includes: Help Center page at /help route, 5 working tabs (Overview, FAQ, Troubleshooting, Shortcuts, What's New), 6 category cards with article modals, FAQ accordion expand/collapse, search functionality filtering FAQs, AI Assistant chat panel powered by GPT-4o via emergentintegrations library.

design_issues.screen: Help Center - Floating AI Assistant button
issues: 'Made with Emergent' badge overlaps with floating AI Assistant button - using force=True bypasses, but minor positioning conflict exists

backend: POST /api/help/assistant responds to simple question 'How do I create a dashboard?'
POST /api/help/assistant responds to template question with relevant info
POST /api/help/assistant responds to chart types question (mentions bar, line, pie, etc.)
POST /api/help/assistant responds to PDF export question
POST /api/help/assistant responds to widget types question
POST /api/help/assistant responds to data upload question
POST /api/help/assistant works with Bearer token authentication
frontend: Help Center page renders at /help route with data-testid='help-center-page'
Overview tab displays by default with 'Browse by Category' section
FAQ tab shows 'Frequently Asked Questions' heading
What's New tab shows 'What's New in DataViz Studio' heading
Search input filters FAQs (tested with 'template' keyword)
6 category cards displayed (Getting Started, Dashboards, Charts & Visualization, Report Builder, Data Management, Widget Types)
Category cards show '4 articles' count each (24 total articles)
Category card click opens modal with article list
'Chat with AI' quick action button opens AI Assistant panel
AI Assistant panel displays 'DataViz Assistant' header with suggested questions
AI Assistant receives and displays AI-generated responses

critical_code_review_comments: Help Center implementation is complete and well-structured
Backend /api/help/assistant endpoint uses emergentintegrations library with GPT-4o model
DATAVIZ_SYSTEM_PROMPT provides comprehensive context about DataViz Studio features
Fallback responses implemented via get_fallback_response() when AI unavailable
Frontend HelpCenterPage.jsx contains well-organized data: HELP_CATEGORIES (6), FAQ_DATA (10), TROUBLESHOOTING_DATA (6), KEYBOARD_SHORTCUTS (10), WHATS_NEW (4)
HelpAssistant.jsx properly integrates with backend API and handles loading/error states
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Help Center feature fully functional at /help route. Key test IDs: help-center-page, help-search-input, tab-overview, tab-faq, tab-troubleshooting, tab-shortcuts, tab-whats-new, help-assistant-btn. AI Assistant works via 'Chat with AI' quick action or floating button (note: badge overlay issue, use force=True). Backend API at POST /api/help/assistant uses emergentintegrations with GPT-4o.

features_verified: 5 tabs working (Overview, FAQ, Troubleshooting, Shortcuts, What's New)
6 category cards (Getting Started, Dashboards, Charts, Reports, Data, Widgets)
